Body: I purchased New Miromax Canvas2Colours, 2 monts ago. I was using Vodafone Sim in the phone , it didn't deduct any amount. But few days ago i buyed new Airtel Sim. And i noticed that whenever i Restart my phone RS 1.50 deducting automatically. I thought that it is problem with mobile tracker, but after searching everything in my phone in settings, i didn't find any mobile tracker in the settings. And i am getting this message when i restart my phone-  CONGRATULATION ON PURCHASING MICROMAX HANDSET.And 1.50 RS is deducting automatically..Can anyone help me please?Please help me...
Title: RS 1.50 Is deducting automatically

history.Text: I purchased New Miromax Canvas2Colours, 2 monts ago. I was using Vodafone Sim in the phone , it didn't deduct any amount. But few days ago i buyed new Airtel Sim. And i noticed that whenever i Restart my phone RS 1.50 deducting automatically. I thought that it is problem with mobile tracker, but after searching everything in my phone in settings, i didn't find any mobile tracker in the settings. And i am getting this message when i restart my phone-  CONGRATULATION ON PURCHASING MICROMAX HANDSET.And 1.50 RS is deducting automatically..Can anyone help me please?Please help me...
